title: Nod
content:
Look what my stubby little finger came across today.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205011651im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/nod_3720.jpg)
  
CommArts May/June 2007 pg.125 (In the midst of all the card stock.)
 [‹ Semi-serif with serifs?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205011651/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33396 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typophile Wiki + John Downer's 'Call It What It Is' ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205011651/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32941 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jac

comments.content:
I guess I am “toasted” then Si :-P

ChrisL

Thanks Jac! My first time published in CA! :-)

ChrisL
doesn’t it make you feel just a little like you were caught doing something...?
Kind of a cheesy blurb for CA, isn’t it? And “_now_ they have a just the place”? Seven years late.

Chuck,  
Kinda like I was caught “French” kissing the girl next door when I was a teenager :-)

ChrisL

PS: Well, you cast your bread upon the waters...

Now I have to buy a copy of that issue :-)

ChrisL
Get someone to make a T-shirt out of that page, Chris. ;-)
It’s all part of their grand plan. Chris.
